O&P Foods is a specialist retail, wholesale and private label grocery importer. Offering a range of the finest international and local food brands.

WHAT GUIDES AND DRIVES US

HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS

Award winning single varietal organic EVOO, traditional tomato and vegetable products and specialty fresh pasta retail lines.

O&P Foods is also a procurement and supply specialist to the wholesale, foodservice, QSR and food manufacturing sectors.quality standards.

WORLD CLASS FOOD PRODUCERS

Passion with integrity are the core elements of all our selected food supply partners.

We partner only with those producers and manufacturers who share our high standards.

CUSTOMER FOCUSED

We aim to always exceed our customers’ expectations for quality food products and service.

Our international network ensures you have the most efficient supply chain and industry leading turnaround times.

OUR SERVICES...

We connect buyers with the world’s best food producers, facilitationg product development and offering global procurement, import & local delivery solutions.
